verses.verse: For <WG1063> as touching <WG4012> <WG99999> the ministering <WG1248> to <WG1519> the saints <WG40>, it is <WG2076> superfluous <WG4053> for me <WG3427> to write <WG1125> to you <WG5213>:

For <WG1063> I know <WG1492> the readiness <WG4288> of your mind <WG5216>, for which <WG3739> I boasted <WG2744> of <WG5228> you <WG5216> to them of Macedonia <WG3110>, that <WG3754> Achaia <WG882> was ready <WG3903> <WG99999> a year ago <WG4070>; and <WG2532> <WG99999> your <WG5216> zeal <WG2205> has provoked <WG2042> very many <WG4119>.

Yet <WG1161> have I sent <WG3992> the brothers <WG80>, lest <WG2443> <WG99999> our <WG2257> boasting <WG2745> of <WG5228> you <WG5216> should be in vain <WG2758> in <WG1722> this <WG5129> behalf <WG3313>; that <WG2443>, as <WG2531> I said <WG3004>, you may <WG3903> be <WG5600> ready <WG3903>:

Lest perhaps <WG3381> if <WG1437> they of Macedonia <WG3110> come <WG2064> with <WG4862> me <WG1698>, and <WG2532> find <WG2147> you <WG5209> unprepared <WG532>, we <WG2249> (that <WG2443> we say <WG3004> not <WG3361>, you <WG5210>) should be ashamed <WG2617> in <WG1722> this same <WG3778> confident <WG5287> boasting <WG2746>.

Therefore <WG3767> I thought it <WG2233> necessary <WG316> to exhort <WG3870> the brothers <WG80>, that <WG2443> they would go before <WG4281> unto <WG1519> you <WG5209>, and <WG2532> make up beforehand <WG4294> your <WG5216> bounty <WG2129>, whereof you had notice before <WG4293>, that the same <WG3778> might be <WG1511> <WG99999> ready <WG2092>, as <WG5613> a matter of bounty <WG2129>, and <WG2532> not <WG3361> as <WG5618> of covetousness <WG4124>.

But <WG1161> this <WG5124> I say <WG3588>, He which sows <WG4687> sparingly <WG5340> shall reap <WG2325> also <WG2532> sparingly <WG5340>; and <WG2532> he <WG3588> which sows <WG4687> <WG99999> bountifully <WG2129> shall reap <WG2325> also <WG2532> <WG99999> bountifully <WG2129>.

Every man <WG1538> according as <WG2531> he purposes <WG4255> in his heart <WG2588>, so let him give <WG3361>; not <WG1537> grudgingly <WG3077>, or <WG2228> of <WG1537> necessity <WG318>: for <WG1063> God <WG2316> loves <WG25> a cheerful <WG2431> giver <WG1395>.

And <WG1161> God <WG2316> is able <WG1415> to make all <WG3956> grace <WG5485> abound <WG4052> toward <WG1519> you <WG5209>; that <WG2443> you <WG3842>, always having <WG2192> all <WG3956> sufficiency <WG841> in <WG1722> all <WG3956> things <WG4052>, may abound to <WG1519> every <WG3956> good <WG18> work <WG2041>:
(As <WG2531> it is written <WG1125>, He has dispersed abroad <WG4650>; he has given <WG1325> to the poor <WG3993>: his <WG846> righteousness <WG1343> remains <WG3306> for <WG1519> ever <WG165>.

Now <WG1161> he that <WG3588> ministers <WG2023> seed <WG4690> to the sower <WG4687> both <WG2532> ministers <WG5524> bread <WG740> for <WG1519> your food <WG1035>, and <WG2532> multiplies <WG4129> your <WG5216> seed sown <WG4703>, and <WG2532> increases <WG837> the fruits <WG1081> of your <WG5216> righteousness <WG1343>;)

Being enriched <WG4148> in <WG1722> every thing <WG3956> to <WG1519> all <WG3956> bountifulness <WG572>, which <WG3748> causes <WG2716> through <WG1223> us <WG2257> thanksgiving <WG2169> to God <WG2316>.

For <WG3754> the administration <WG1248> of this <WG3778> service <WG3009> not <WG3756> only <WG3440> supplies <WG4322> the wants <WG5303> of the saints <WG40>, but <WG235> is <WG2076> abundant <WG4052> also <WG2532> by <WG1223> many <WG4183> thanksgivings <WG2169> unto God <WG2316>;

While <WG1223> by the proof <WG1382> of this <WG3778> ministration <WG1248> they glorify <WG1392> God <WG2316> for <WG1909> your <WG5216> professed <WG3671> subjection <WG5292> unto <WG1519> the gospel <WG2098> of Christ <WG5547>, and <WG2532> for your noble <WG572> distribution <WG2842> unto <WG1519> them <WG846>, and <WG2532> unto <WG1519> all men <WG3956>;

And <WG2532> by their <WG846> prayer <WG1162> for <WG5228> you <WG5216>, which yearn for <WG1971> you <WG5209> because <WG1223> of the exceeding <WG5235> grace <WG5485> of God <WG2316> in <WG1909> you <WG5213>.
Thanks <WG5485> be unto <WG1909> God <WG2316> for <WG1161> his <WG846> unspeakable <WG411> gift <WG1431>.
